data.title: Justin Siegel - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Justin Siegel: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Ex-husband of Emmy Rossum, who is known for her role on the TV series Shameless, as well as the movies The Day After Tomorrow and The Phantom of the Opera.

Before Fame

He earned a degree in sociology from the University of Massachusetts. He also attended the Berklee College of Music.

Trivia

He is an entrepreneur, angel investor, and music executive. He is the founder and managing partner of ATX Angel, LLC and a partner at Capital Factory in Austin, Texas. He is also a co-founder of JNJ Mobile.

Family Life

He was married to Emmy Rossum from 2008 to 2010. He is married to a woman named Tiffany Marie Brannon Siegel.

Associated With
